co.cask.cdap.api.workflow

Interface WorkflowContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DatasetContext, RuntimeContext, ServiceDiscoverer

    public interface WorkflowContext
extends RuntimeContext, ServiceDiscoverer, DatasetContext
    Represents the runtime context of a WorkflowAction.

      • getProgramRunner

        Runnable getProgramRunner(String name)
        Returns a Runnable that launches the associated program with the specified name when the run method is invoked.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if no program with the specified name is defined in the workflow
        UnsupportedOperationException - if it is called from Predicate
